column4: How do I specify where APT-GET is going to install something?
How do I specify where APT-GET is going to install something?
Not really. If you change where apt-get puts stuff then the thing you're installing won't be able to find itself.

Well, I am following, https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Installation/OverSSH and I am trying to install the kernel ,but it says there is no more space, but my HD has 699M free, and I think it is trying to put it on the RamDisk
